title: Forces exerted on ladder to keep it upright

content.prompt: A ladder at rest is leaning against a wall at an angle. Which of the following forces must have the same magnitude as the frictional force exerted on the ladder by the floor?

choices.label: The force of gravity on the ladder
The normal force exerted on the ladder by the floor
The frictional force exerted on the ladder by the wall
The normal force exerted on the ladder by the wall

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
